prompt.content: You are a senior software engineer reflecting on a code review you previously generated, the goal was to create a review comment that would have triggered the fix commit provided. Only respond with the improved review comment.

Reflect on your previous response regarding the following fix commit:

[Insert fix content here]

Here is your previous review of the fix commit:

[previous_response]

Evaluate whether your review closely resembles a real code review, providing actionable feedback in a professional tone. Check if your review addresses key issues, such as security vulnerabilities and offers clear suggestions for resolution. 

If the review was incomplete or too conversational, provide a revised response that adheres to these guidelines. If the review had no issues simply generate the same review.
